description: Removes or quarantines rogue software by its installation path. Stops related processes, deletes associated scheduled tasks, optionally quarantines the target folder, and cleans up registry uninstall entries. Produces a JSON log of actions taken.

script_parameters.name: TargetPath
script_parameters.description: Full path to the rogue software directory or executable to remove or quarantine.

script_parameters.name: Quarantine
script_parameters.description: If set, moves the rogue software to C:\Quarantine instead of deleting it, and restricts permissions.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response JSON log path. Overwrites existing content.
